socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. 40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Create a Tornado that hinders and repeatedly damages enemies around it.
